doc.after: Web conferencing may be used as an umbrella term for various types of online collaborative services including web seminars webinars webcasts and peer level web meetings It may also be used in a more narrow sense to refer only to the peer level web meeting context in an attempt to disambiguate it from the other types of collaborative sessions 1 Terminology related to these technologies is inexact and no generally agreed upon source or standards organization exists to provide an established usage reference The distinction between webcast and webinar is becoming particularly difficult to define as functionality and usage becomes more similar and vendors substitute the terms freely For more details see Etymology below
